about_the_game:
Relive the nostalgic experience of WarpZone vs THE DIMENSION with Leonardo Lima's amazing soundtrack. All proceeds go to the composer.

Track List

  • Chinatown Stage
  • From China to Highway
  • Highway Stage
  • From Highway to Truck Train
  • Truck Train Stage
  • From Truck Train to Bunker
  • Bunker Stage
  • Bunker Stage Elevator
  • Bunker Hangar Stage
  • From Bunker to ZUZ-4's Spaceship
  • ZUZ-4's Spaceship Stage
  • From ZUZ-4's Spaceship to Spaceway
  • Spaceway from Mars Stage
  • From Spaceway to Dimension Town
  • Dimension Town Stage
  • Dimension Theme
  • Masculino Men Theme
  • ZUZ-4 Theme
  • Ucolecionador Theme
  • Easy Ending
  • Normal Ending
  • Game Over
  • Continue
  • Credits
  • Choose Your Character
  • Ucolecionador Theme (Unused)
  • Dimension Theme (Unused)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0GHz.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 83 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card.
